title: The Turke A worthie tragedie. As it hath bene diuers times acted by the Children of his Maiesties Reuels. Written by Iohn Mason Maister of Artes.
author: Mason, John, fl. 1606-1610.
publisher: Printed by E[dward] A[llde] for Iohn Busbie and are to be sold at his shop in S. Dunstons Churchyard in Fleete-streete,
notes: Running title reads: Mulleasses the Turke.
Reproduction of the original in the British Library.
